siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz | Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Consultant | RAG, LLMs, AI Agents
siteMetadata.description: Seasoned Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Consultant | Ex-Elastic | RAG, Agents, LLMs, Search Optimization
siteMetadata.about:
Seasoned software engineer and team lead specializing in GenAI, search, and scalable systems. I build RAG applications, AI agents, and hybrid search solutions using Python, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frameworks.

As a consultant, I've delivered end-to-end GenAI projects for clients across industries. My background spans ad-tech, finance, and big data with deep expertise in Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, and LLM-powered applications.

Recent wins: Webby Award for "Human or Not" and Google AI Hackathon winner for "Tube Uni."

Available for GenAI consulting, partnerships, public speaking, and private workshops.

markdownRemark.excerpt: As part of my work with BigData Boutique, I’ll be teaming up with the AWS team to deliver the AWS RAG & GenAI Innovation Workshop 2025. It’s a focused…
markdownRemark.html:
As part of my work with BigData Boutique, I’ll be teaming up with the AWS team to deliver the AWS RAG & GenAI Innovation Workshop 2025.

It’s a focused, practical session where we help a customer build a working Retrieval-Augmented Generation demo on their own data—not sample docs. The goal: leave with something tangible you can iterate on internally.

What we actually do

  • Understand the user problem and pick a target use case
  • Collect and lightly structure a slice of your real content
  • Chunk + preprocess (keep it simple, explain trade-offs)
  • Generate embeddings and load a vector store
  • Wire retrieval + LLM prompt flow
  • Add basic guardrails & relevance sanity checks
  • Quick evaluation loop (spot checks + simple metrics)
  • Leave you with next-step pointers (hardening, scaling, monitoring)

Who it’s for

Teams who want to move from slides / pilots to something concrete, fast.

Link

Workshop page: https://bigdataboutique.com/workshop/aws-rag-genai-innovation-workshop-2025

If you want to explore running a similar session on your data, feel free to reach out.
